title: Dodge "DAYTONA" Font ID
content:
Good day all, I've been trying for a while to identify a font that Dodge uses in its decals and emblems for "DAYTONA" to do some custom work, but I haven't been able to lock it down. Does this look familiar to anybody?

Link to pic of DAYTONA decal:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [M5174322AB[1].jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016093741/http:/typophile.com/files/M5174322AB%5B1%5D.jpg) | 39.57 KB |
author: Rixter

comments.content: Hard to say, may be one of these: [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016093741/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/compacta), [Helvetica (Ultra/Extra?) Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016093741/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica), [Impact](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016093741/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/impact)
